text: United Nations Security Council resolution 2080 was adopted in 2012. ==See also== * List of United Nations Security Council Resolutions 2001 to 2100 (2011–2012) ==References== ==External links== *Text of the Resolution at undocs.org Category:2012 United Nations Security Council resolutions Category:United Nations Security Council resolutions concerning the International Criminal Tribunal for Rwanda Category:December 2012 events
title: United Nations Security Council Resolution 2080
